scripts.build:tauri-plugin-holochain-service: pnpm run build:holochain-manager-uniffi && cd crates/tauri-plugin-holochain-service && pnpm run build
scripts.start: cd examples/end-user-happ && nix develop --command bash -c "pnpm run tauri dev"
scripts.android:start: cd examples/end-user-happ && nix develop .#androidDev --command bash -c "pnpm run tauri android dev"
